references.paper_title: Safepicking: Learning safe object extraction via object-level mapping
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the concept of safe object manipulation, a key aspect of the work presented in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Gen6d: Generalizable model-free 6-dof object pose estimation from rgb images
references.reason: This work is highly relevant as it directly addresses the challenge of generalizable 6D object pose estimation, a core focus of the target paper.

references.paper_title: Megapose: 6d pose estimation of novel objects via render & compare
references.reason: This paper provides a strong baseline for unseen object pose estimation using rendering and comparison techniques, forming a basis for the methods investigated in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Normalized object coordinate space for category-level 6d object pose and size estimation
references.reason: This paper proposes a category-level approach to 6D object pose estimation, a key concept that the target paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Emerging properties in self-supervised vision transformers
references.reason: This paper introduces the DINO vision transformer model, which is leveraged by the target paper for robust object representation and matching, significantly impacting the performance of the proposed approach.
